title: 金粒不经花啊
author: 虚无廿都
txt_content:
攒了好久的金粒
就因为发了个服务器宣传贴每天提升花光了
哎~
穷穷了

replies.txt_content: 是的，买6-7个服务器提升我就用完了

replies.author: BiggayJN
replies.txt_content: @卡壳 他的多

replies.author: 卡壳
replies.txt_content: 金锭也不经发

replies.author: 上杉夏相
replies.txt_content: 那就多多水贴嘛

replies.author: kaiyv
replies.txt_content: 金锭换金粒通道怎么还不开

replies.author: 武易
replies.txt_content: 提升卡可以提升服务器，提升服务器有什么用？

replies.author: -xiao_kai-
replies.txt_content: 金粒都拿去换金锭了

replies.author: MrAoty
replies.txt_content: 一样，顶贴用掉了我所有金粒

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 确实啊。

replies.author: 我本不同
replies.txt_content: 我觉着，可以一金锭换9金粒

replies.author: The_Neeko
replies.txt_content: 要是能钻石换金粒就好惹

replies.author: The_Neeko
replies.txt_content: 我也是顶服务器帖子两天就没惹

replies.author: 是叶子呀
replies.txt_content: 对金粒太难赚了

replies.author: QingTFH3
replies.txt_content: 那就开小号（bushi）

replies.author: 氵的方块
replies.txt_content: 多氵几个帖就有了

replies.author: 一只鸽纸
replies.txt_content: 水就完事了

replies.author: 小蜗.
replies.txt_content: 顶帖？我自己服务器都不顶我给别人服务器顶

replies.author: 小鱼鱼也
replies.txt_content: 多多氵贴

replies.author: 小斌OvO
replies.txt_content: 多氵氵贴

replies.author: K_A_O
replies.txt_content: 金锭怎么就换不了金粒呢，可恶

replies.author: 武易
replies.txt_content: 恭喜大佬成功嚯嚯金粒！！！

replies.author: 3344520Z
replies.txt_content:
给你介绍一个顶贴的人
QQ173817010
5r一次

replies.author: 小鱼鱼也
replies.txt_content: 多多氵贴

replies.author: 北极仙光
replies.txt_content: 氵贴就有了

replies.author: lzj634
replies.txt_content: 对头  金粒永远是不够的

replies.author: oardwalk
replies.txt_content:
354560990 发表于 2020-4-28 11:39
是的，买6-7个服务器提升我就用完了
金粒干什么用的？？？

replies.author: oardwalk
replies.txt_content:
lzj634 发表于 2020-4-29 10:01
对头  金粒永远是不够的
为什么不够用？

replies.author: addc123
replies.txt_content: 水贴保证两天一张卡，曾经买了致富（穷）卡一夜回到解放前

replies.author: lzj634
replies.txt_content:
boardwalk 发表于 2020-4-29 10:07
为什么不够用？
因为想换金块勋章

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content: 我都没你穷

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content: 水帖他不香吗

replies.author: mc怪蜀黍
replies.txt_content: 问题不大水就完了

replies.author: haoli133609
replies.txt_content: 可以考虑买一下负负卡搏一搏单车变摩托
水的越多金粒越多awa

replies.author: -雪糕-
replies.txt_content: 一天一次服务器宣传贴，然后做每日任务在把回复金粒领完，消耗会慢点
